mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Barber, Francis G.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Cedarville, Green Co., Ohio [Cedarville, Green County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Barber, Francis G. Patient Age: 23. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound left thigh. Location Wounded: Cloyd's Mountain [Virginia]. Date Wounded: 1864/05/09. Nature of Wound: Musket ball. Result: Mustered out and discharged from service.
